attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is essential that coastal defences are put in place in Mounts Bay to defend Penzance & Newlyn.  There are plans & engineers I have discussed it with say they should have priority/urgency. Yet because it does not succeed on a point system it has been rejected.....They should be done at the same time as the other coastal developments.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
